description.component: Bootstrap custom progress bars featuring support for stacked bars, animated backgrounds, and text labels.

color.name: Progress Bar Color
color.description: Use background utility classes to change the appearance of individual progress bars.

striped.name: Striped
striped.description: Add `.progress-bar-striped` to any `.progress-bar` to apply a stripe via CSS gradient over the background color.

animated.name: Animated
animated.description: The striped gradient can also be animated. Add `.progress-bar-animated` to `.progress-bar` to animate the stripes right to left via CSS3 animations.

label.name: Label
label.description: Add labels to your progress bars by placing text within the `.progress-bar`.

percent.name: Percent
percent.description: The percentage of the progress between 1 to 100.

message.name: Message
message.description: A string containing information to be displayed.

utility_classes.name: Utility Classes
utility_classes.description: An array of utility classes that can be used to add extra Bootstrap utility classes or custom classes to this component.

wrapper_attributes.name: Wrapper Attributes
wrapper_attributes.description: HTML attributes for the Progress Bar wrapper element.

indicator_attributes.name: Indicator Attributes
indicator_attributes.description: HTML attributes for the Progress Bar indicator element.

label_attributes.name: Label Attributes
label_attributes.description: HTML attributes for the Progress Bar label element.

message_attributes.name: Message Attributes
message_attributes.description: HTML attributes for the Progress Bar message element.
